mapper.select: select rownum, i.* from (select * from candle_item order by item_no desc) i where rownum between 1 and 4
select * from candle_order where user_no = #{userNo} and order_status > 0 order by order_no desc
select oi.*, i.item_name from candle_order_item oi join candle_item i on oi.item_no = i.item_no where order_no = #{orderNo}
select * from candle_item where item_status = 0 order by item_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into candle_item values ((select nvl(max(item_no), 0) + 1 from candle_item), #{typeNo}, #{itemName}, #{itemImage}, #{itemPrice}, 0, 1, 0, #{itemImagePath}, #{itemInfo})
mapper.select: select o.*, u.user_id from candle_order o join candle_user u on o.user_no = u.user_no where order_status > 0 order by order_no desc
mapper.update: update candle_item set item_name = #{itemName}, type_no = #{typeNo}, item_image = #{itemImage}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, item_image_path = nvl(#{itemImagePath}, item_image_path) where item_no = #{itemNo}
update candle_order set order_status = 3 where order_no = #{orderNo}
